data.title: Permanent Revolution
data.meta_description: Permanent-Revolution - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This book provides a comprehensive overview of the development of visual art in Ukraine from the late 19th century to the early 21st century. It describes the major artistic movements and styles that emerged over this period, including modernism, avant-garde movements like cubo-futurism, socialist realism under the Soviet Union, and contemporary art in independent Ukraine. The book explores how political and social transformations in Ukraine's history, from its time as part of the Russian Empire to independence, shaped artistic practices and discourse. It features discussions of important Ukrainian artists and examines regional artistic scenes in cities like Kyiv, Kharkiv, Odesa, and Lviv.
